Blog.post: Hey peoples. I am like hella bored so i just decided to make a new blog. Omg so many stupid finals!! Well theres not much else to say. Lulu
still bored.nothing new has happened.

Hey Peoples! Today has been such a good day! Omg. Emily please call me! I need to talk to you! Ya so not much going on right now.... heres my schedule of what i have done so far today: 9:30 AM- read in bed 11:00 AM- got out of Bed 11:15-ate breakfast 11:45- went to feed my neighbors cat 12:00PM-came home 12:30PM-did my hw 1:15PM-ate lunch 1:45PM-worked on "how to project" 3:19-talking you Well thats how my day has been so far. TTyl. Lulu

Hey Omg I like really wanna kill ______ right now!! God. The good thing that happened today was that in the progressive relay our team got first!! OH YA!! Max, Jeremy, David,Nicole, Evan, Zach, Alex,Me,Nader, and Kevin. We are hella good! LULU
So bored right now. Theres like nothing to do. I hate sundays....... Lulu
Hey, Went Shopping Today! Got alot of new things! Not much going on right now. really bored. please call me!! 937-9480 Lulu

MRS. JENNINGS IS A BIG FAT FUBAR!!! if you don't know what that means just im and i will tell you ; ). Today I went over to Cassandra's house to work on core project. Not much happening. I g2g eat din din. Talk to you later!! Lulu

Hey Sharks lost yesterday. It's ok though. They had a great season! They played really well throught out the whole year. If only Cheechoo and had recieved that pass and scored. They were sooo close to *tieing up the game! with only like 10 secs left. Oh well. I have a feeling that they are going to do hella well next year! Lulu * I can't spell lol
Really bored right now. Not much else to say. Lulu

Hey Sharks game tonight, in Calgary, Flames are going down! The Flames are leading the series right now 3-2. But that will change tonight! I am sooo bored today! Omg though I won a $50 gift certificate to Broadway Plaza! OHYA!! I can now buy what ever I want! YIPPE! lol. Also American Idol is on tongiht! I reallyl hope Fantasia wins. Thats really sucks that Latoya got off last week! OMG Jasmine sucks! She can't even sing! Shes just making a fool of herself up there! ya I no I am crazy about American Idol. LOL. Ok well I have to get off. My battery is running low. TTYL! LM
Hey Sharks lost last night. Oh well,Flames are going down. Not much happended to day. I went over to Cassandra's house to work on a project. TTYAL! Lulu
Hey Sharks game tonight! 7:00 pm. Um not much else to say. I have soccer practice today won't be on untill tomorrow. i g2g. TTYL! Lulu
OH YA SHARKS WON! THEY KICKED THE FLAMES A$$!!! FINAL SCORE 4-2!!! THE SERIES IS NOW TIED 2-2. Next game tomorrow in San Jose. Lulu

Sharks Shoot........................and they SCORE!!! Sharks lead the game 1-0 . It's the 2nd period with 13min and 15 sec to go. They can keep it up I no. Rathje scored the goal! HAHAHA. Commerical now. Today went to Bekah's house to try on the warm up jerseys. Went to Macy's after that. Tell you more later! Lulu

Hey, Waiting for brownies to be done so I decided to write a new entry while waiting. Not much going on tomorrow. Glad I don't have any hw. Didn't really eat dinner tonight. Not really hungry. Sharks game tomorrow. Hope they win. Oh g2g brownie are done!! YUMMY! Lulu

Hey, Today was sooo fun. Went to Animals on Broadway from 10 am to 430 pm, my mom had a booth down there so we stayed there the whole time. I even think I won the Pet Poker Run thing (only grace will know what i am talkin about )! I was going to go to a b-day party but I started to feel really sick. I still kind of feel that way, but I am better. I am on my dads laptop right now our computers like not working. I am the only won up right now, except my dad, my mom is takin a nap, my brother is taking a nap and my dad is on a bike ride. I better finish this up because my brother just woke up and is yelling at me to type in a different room because he is trying to fall asleep. Oh he just needs his beauty rest, god! Sharks are taking on the Flames tomorrow, so I probably won't be on very much between the game, need to root them on! Lulu

SHARKS WON LAST NIGHT 3-0!!!!!! Flames fans were so pissed. This weekend is going to be soo much fun!! Today we went to the creek in science. It was Soooooo boring! I had alot of hw today too. I can't wait untill Saturday! ttyl! Lulu
SHARKS LEAD THE GAME 1-0.
Sharks have been holding up. 2nd period. 0-0 Watch out Flames.
Hey, Sharks game tonight! There going to Flames a$$.

Hey, omg i am so glad that it is summer! i just got back from vacation yesterday. We went to Catalina Island like we do every year. It has been getting kind of boring because for 2 years in a row we haven't gone snorkling because the weather has not been very nice. :( Next week i have soccer camp! I am so happy. #1: i luv to play soccer #2: i will get away from the house and will acuatly be waking up early! lol. I luv to sleep in. so i will get back on schedule when i go to soccer camp. today i slept into 12:00. hahha. i was so tired. the last time i slept in that late was a year ago. i just luv summer. stay up untill like 12:30 and wake up at 12:00. well i am like bored right now, u must have noticed because i am writing alot, none of my friends are home and i don't have that much to do. Well lets see....umm when i was at Catalina, I went miniature golfing, and saw harry potter 3. That movie was much better than the first 2! and it seemed shorter because it was better, even though it was like 2hrs and 21 mins! lol. i also went shoppin and fishing. Omg i am never going fishing again! the poor little fish! i caught 2 fish. the first one was ok when it was hooked to the hook, we got it off and threw it back right away. but the second one was well kind of sad, the hook was like caught in its eyelid!! I had to turn away when my dad was taking the hook out! it only took like 30 seconds but it seemed more like 5 mins. lol ok well i have to go. ttyl! Lulu

Heyz, Omg i am sooooo bored. Ugh. I really want to run right now. Thank god theres soccer practice tonight! Zach I can't believe we won our softball game! lol. Remember Daniella? lol! ( inside joke ) that was funny. So ya i acuatly don't have any hw from jennings! Yippee!! lol. OMg i have so many stupid finals! _______ is such an ass. I mean ______ really thinks that I want to be their partner. God. I feel really sry for you emily who has to put up with ______. Ok well not much else to say. Lulu

Hey, I haven't wrote in here in a long time! God summer goes by fast. Ya so not much happening, my uncles here, and yesterday I had a soccer scrimmage. Soccer camp was fun. Umm this coming week I am going to tennis camp. I am soo hungry. I haven't eaten dinner yet. Umm well the Tour de France has been going well for Lance Armstrong. The mountain stages started yesterday. Armstrong got second with Iban Basso first. But good news today. Lance got first. He is now over 6 mins ahead of Ulrich. Well will see what happens, I mean since Tyler Hamilton is gone. g2g ttyl Lulu
